title: Fix lead save failure and admin password backend errors

requirements.text: Fix the 'Failed to save lead' error in the lead entry form by implementing or correcting the backend addLead function to properly store lead data with all fields (name, mobile, treatment, followUpDate, consultationDate, rating, remarks, status)

quotes: In lead entry it's showing fail to save lead error

acceptanceCriteria: Lead entry form successfully saves new leads without showing 'Failed to save lead' error
All lead fields are properly persisted to backend storage
Lead data is immediately queryable after save

requirements.text: Fix the 'backend function not implemented' error in admin password setup by implementing the missing backend functions for admin password management (setAdminPassword, unlockAdmin, or equivalent functions referenced by AdminGateDialog)

quotes: in admin setup password it's showing backend function not implemented error

acceptanceCriteria: Admin password setup completes successfully without 'backend function not implemented' error
Admin can set initial password with security question
Admin can unlock with correct password after setup
Password is properly hashed and stored in backend

constraints: Maintain existing data structures for leads and admin authentication
Do not modify the single-actor architecture
Ensure backward compatibility with existing stored data
nonGoals: Changing the UI or form fields for lead entry
Modifying the admin authentication flow in frontend
Adding new features beyond fixing the reported errors
